item.title: Lobsters Top Stories: Sunday, November 10, 2024 at 5:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. An alternative idea for a typed language living alongside/inside JavaScript (11 points | 6 comments)
2. PSA: SQLite does not do checksums (13 points | 16 comments)
3. Regular Restarts Are Good, Actually (18 points | 6 comments)

7. When Machine Learning Tells the Wrong Story (3 points | 1 comment)
8. Discussion: Adding memory regions to Go (15 points | no comments)
9. The BPF instruction set architecture is now RFC 9669 (6 points | no comments)
10. Unused keys in vim (4 points | no comments)
11. Algol 68 – A Retrospective (3 points | no comments)
12. Tone of Life (30 points | 2 comments)
13. Known Attacks On Elliptic Curve Cryptography (38 points | 4 comments)

15. How to self-host all of Bluesky (except the AppView (for now)) (39 points | 33 comments)
16. Debian GSoC 2024 Final Reports (7 points | 1 comment)
17. Algol-68 seemed like a good idea – until it wasn’t (10 points | 9 comments)
18. Rust's Sneaky Deadlock With `if let` Blocks (40 points | 20 comments)

24. SNES & PlayStation cubic ADPCM interpolation (7 points | no comments)
25. A New Era of macOS Sandbox Escapes: Overlooked Attack Surface, 10+ New Vulns (21 points | 7 comments)
